title: Crossing a River - Finding Oneself
description: Thirteen wise men are on a journey which involves crossing a river. Will they all make it safely across, or will they be eaten by the snake monster who is said to live in that river? Listen to talented storyteller Peter Chand telling this funny, Indian Tale and find out.
itunes:title: Crossing a River - Finding Oneself
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
